ygData.subject: Re: Re:[EverQuest] The Beastlord
ygData.msgSnippet: Nah, I probably know more about it than most people. ... From: Su To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com Sent: Wednesday, July 31, 2002 3:30 PM Subject: Re:
ygData.messageBody:
Nah, I probably know more about it than most people.
----- Original Message -----
From: Su
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, July 31, 2002 3:30 PM
Subject: Re: Re:[EverQuest] The Beastlord

> I just wanted to find out more about the beastlord.
>
Heh. Nobody is blaming you for it. You're right, you just asked about the
Beastlord. Did you find out what you wanted to know or do you still need
more info?
luv,
-su
